attributes.action: Ensure that AQA answers for the poor GCSE biology paper for this year
attributes.additional_details: We need a lot of signatures so share as much as you can
attributes.background: This year AQA have really messed up the biology papers and who knows what will come with the next science papers. Stand up and be counted in ensuring that they: Take their inability to stick to relevant questions into consideration when marking your paper's this year

rejection.details:
We cannot accept your petition because the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the issue you raise. Exam boards are independent of Government and Parliament. They are regulated by the Office of Qualifications and Examinations Regulation (Ofqual), which regulates qualifications, examinations and assessments in England.

You can make a complaint to Ofqual about the organisations it regulates. Further information about how to complain is available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ofqual/about/complaints-procedure.
